page.title: 12TRELLECH VILLAGE SHOP.
page.content: ONE OF THE SHOPS IN TRELLECH IS FEATHERSTONES. IT IS A SMALL SHOP. MR. AND MRS. FEATHERSTONE, WHO OWN THE SHOP HAVE LIVED THERE FOR 30 YEARS. THEY LIKE WORKING THERE. THEY HAVE ONE SHOP ASSISTANT AND ARE NOT OPEN ON SUNDAYS. THEY OPEN AT 8.30 AND CLOSE AT 5.30. THEY GET THE PASSERS-BY AND THE LOCALS FOR CUSTOMERS. THEIR BUSIEST DAY IS THURSDAY. THEY SELL TINNED VEGTABLES, FRUIT, MEAT, FROZEN MEAT AND VEGTABLES, ICE CREAM, ICECREAM, SQUASH, AND DRINKS, BISCUITS AND CONFECTIONERY, CHINA, PETROL, CALOR GAS, COAL, STATIONERY, AND SOUVENIRS, WICH INCLUDE TRAYS AND CHINA MATS.
